title: IP-Nomad
description: A browser-based IP address tracker that fetches real-time geolocation details and displays the location on an interactive map using Leaflet.js and a public API.
coverStyle: background: radial-gradient(circle,rgba(2, 0, 36, 1) 0%, rgba(9, 9, 121, 1) 47%, rgba(0, 212, 255, 1) 100%); color: white;
